issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

If canScale is true, it's sometimes necessary to not show the controls. Requested by premium customer.

To maintain backward compatibility, enableZoomControls is set to true.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Add enableZoomControls property to ImageView

comments.body:
{html}

(from [2ca63e51e9f0c143c1835b02cce4254d63a7b5b8]) [#848 state:resolved] enableZoomControls added to ImageView to control appearance of zoom buttons. By default, true to maintain backward compatibility. http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/2ca63e51e9f0c...

{html}
